short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Decode URI components from URL parameters and display as a list.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This will display passed encoded url parameters as decoded list in key:value pair. You will have an option to click and navigate to the expected url. This will be helpful when some short url does not redirect to the destination url if it is opened in the desktop browser. Credits: Web-site icons created by Hilmy Abiyyu A. - Flaticon
